text: Tara jora diye allahara kasama khaya ye, yadi tadera kache kona nidarsana ase, tabe abasya'i tara bisbasa sthapana karabe. Apani bale dinah nidarsanabali to allahara kache'i ache. He musalamanagana, tomaderake ke balala ye, yakhana tadera kache nidarsanabali asabe, takhana tara bisbasa sthapana karabe'i
